description: Retrieves a list of resource view snapshots based on specified criteria. This operation supports various use cases, including:

parameters.name: Catalog
parameters.description: Specifies the catalog related to the request.

parameters.name: EngagementIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the engagement associated with the snapshots.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to retrieve the next set of results. If there are no additional results, this value is null.

nested_items.name: ResourceSnapshotSummaries
nested_items.description: An array of resource snapshot summary objects.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the snapshot. This globally unique identifier can be used for cross-service references and in IAM policies.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: The AWS account ID of the entity that owns the resource from which the snapshot was created.

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the specific resource snapshotted. The format might vary depending on the ResourceType.

nested_items.name: ResourceSnapshotTemplateName
nested_items.description: The name of the template used to create the snapshot.

nested_items.name: Revision
nested_items.description: The revision number of the snapshot. This integer value is incremented each time the snapshot is updated, allowing for version tracking of the resource snapshot.
